talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>We don’t have to worry about Anu Arendel for the moment.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
So Anu Arendel is still not affected?
That's a relief. I was worried since it's where the Monolith's entrance is.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Discovery of Labyrinth$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Anyways, I heard there are huge problems with <FONT color=#a82424>Nests</FONT> now.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You've done your job well this time. You must have matured a little.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I have ways of finding out. Please don't keep things to yourself.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
So you know about it already…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You said my help was useful in the Monolith. I'm sure there's something I can help you with here too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You won't be of much help even if I told you about it.
So quit being nosy and go back.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Things always go awry when people try to take matters into their own hands!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
This is a completely different issue.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I didn't mean it that way… <FONT color=#7e12d2>(I must have said something wrong...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
What did you say? How dare you…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That's right. I'm not sure what I can do but there's got to be something.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Velskud, why don't you let {user_nick} keep the Nests with problems in check?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I won't disappoint you!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You're telling me to put this idiot in charge of something so important?
Garden of Time and Space will only become more chaotic.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm… slow? Are you saying I'm stupid…?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Velskud, I understand your concerns.
But judging from everything {user_nick} has done for us so far, {user_nick} is just slow at understanding things.
In battles, {user_nick} has proven to be highly reliable.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I have a brain too!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Hmm… I see.
Lacking the brain but useful in battles.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm listening.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
{user_nick}, I've changed my mind.
I don't think you're smart enough to understand me but I'll still explain to you what happened so far.
I won't repeat myself so listen carefully.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Labyrinth? What is that?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
There has been a phenomenon where Nests are dividing themselves.
We call it the Labyrinth, and it's making everything complicated.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But I don't understand what you're saying.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I told you not to make me repeat myself…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So it's a new Nest. Then let's…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I overestimated your intellectual abilities for a moment.
Phew... Labyrinth is the name of a phenomenon that divides Nests into several sections.
To put it simply, one Nest has now become many Nests.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm listening, Velskud! I'm not going anywhere.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Oh, please have patience.
As I have said earlier, Labyrinth is different from new Nests.
Why don't you sit down and continue listening? Velskud seems a little annoyed…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Wow that sounds serious.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Labyrinth is like a division of dimensions.
There's only one owner for each Nest so it's not like new monsters are creating new Nests.
It's just that Nests are being split into numerous sections by some unknown external force.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That sounds like you could use some help.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I'm glad that you at least understand how serious the situation is.
Somebody is purposely dividing the space. Labyrinth is an artificial creation.
We need time to find out who's behind this.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(That sounded like Argenta…)</FONT> Thank you for explaining it to me so kindly.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
We need to stop Labyrinths from spreading.
Labyrinths do not appear in Nests easily but once they do, it's hard to get rid of them.
I've taken some emergency actions on them but they will spread rapidly if they are not constantly kept in check.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, I'll go to a Labyrinth right away.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I-I'm not kind. It's just that your slow brain can't understand me if I don't explain in detail.
(I talked too much again...)
So you know what you should do now, kid?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Chiron Nest?</html>
<html>Mist Nest?</html>
<html>Guardian Nest?</html>
<html>Volcano Nest?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You don't even know where you can find one.
Do you know which Nest has a Labyrinth?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That's more serious than I expected. Four Nests…?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Wrong. All of the four Nests have Labyrinths now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Leave it to me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I don't care which one you choose to go to, but make sure Labyrinths do not spread beyond the existing ones.
Can you do that?

$Velskud$
Then I'll focus on investigating why Labyrinth appeared.
I'll trust you this once.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What the heck are those Labyrinths…? I've never seen so many Nests in my life…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Good job. Were there any other issues in the Nests?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Will we be okay?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
It must have given you quite a shock.
If we don't do anything, they will keep growing.
That's what's scary about those Labyrinths.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>…All right.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I've done everything I could and things won't escalate into a total apocalypse.
Thanks to you, we have bought some time and I can keep investigating
on the causes of Labyrinth. So don't be scared.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's just that I was a little surprised since I saw something like that for the first time.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You have so much more to do. How can you do your job when you're trembling in fear already?
I don't know if I can keep you in charge of anything.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you have a hunch?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I'll buy that for now.
Childs in Monolith… Sudden appearance of Labyrinths…
I don’t think it's a coincidence that they are happening at the same time.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(*pout*)</FONT> All right.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You don't have to know about that.
I'll let you know when you have stuff to do.
For now, you just have to keep the Labyrinths in check.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Receive Reward)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Velskud$
I'm glad that you understood what I said.
I hope you'll carry on doing a good job.

journal.title: What happened at Garden of Time and Space
journal.contents:
Talk to Velskud to find out what happened in Garden of Time and Space.

Garden of Time and Space - Velskud
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Velskud in Garden of Time and Space.

journal.title: Labyrinth in Nests
journal.contents:
Labyrinth has appeared in some Nests linked to the Garden of Time and Space. Go and investigate.
* Clear one of the following Nests' Labyrinth.

Garden of Time and Space - Chiron Nest
Garden of Time and Space - Mist Nest
Garden of Time and Space - Guardian Nest
Garden of Time and Space - Volcano Nest

journal.title: Checking on Labyrinth
journal.contents:
Report to Velskud in Garden of Time and Space about the Labyrinth.

Garden of Time and Space - Velskud
